Articles.Content:
This is an exploration ship (includes, heavy lift launcher, upper stage, interplanetary stage, orbiter, lander and a small rover) designed to help you find your way to other planets without jeopardising any kerbal lives. No snacks included.

Some efficiency and cost have been sacrificed in exchange for incredible performance and science value! Make sure you know your thing before heading to Vall or Tylo as you may find yourself in trouble there! Usage of this craft for Minmus/Mun is not recommended as it is way too overpowered for those short missions. 

More info in the link below,

Happy launchings!

![H5x577Z.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/H5x577Z.jpg)

[see Eeloo Surveyor on KerbalX.com](http://kerbalx.com/iVG/Eeloo-Surveyor)
